pkgmetadata.longdescription: Historical Data Retrieval from 'PurpleAir' Sensors via API // Provides tools for retrieving and analyzing air quality data from 'PurpleAir' sensors through their API. Functions enable downloading historical measurements, accessing sensor metadata, and managing API request limitations through chunked data retrieval. For more information about the 'PurpleAir' API, see https://api.purpleair.com/.
